_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
notes: SPY jade lizard: short 580P + short 620/630 call spread, Apr expiry
rationale: Bullish bias, credit exceeds call spread width = no upside risk

entry_conditions.notes: Jade lizard: short naked put + short call vertical. Collect enough credit to exceed call spread width, eliminating upside risk. Downside risk remains (like naked put). Best in elevated IV with bullish bias.

pnl_drivers.max_loss: Downside: short put strike - net credit (naked put risk). Upside: ZERO if credit > call spread width
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Theta decay on short put and short call spread
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: IV crush â€” selling premium on multiple legs

greeks_profile.theta: positive â€” multiple short options decaying
greeks_profile.vega: negative â€” profits from IV contraction
greeks_profile.delta: slightly positive (bullish bias from short put)
greeks_profile.gamma: negative â€” risk if stock drops sharply through short put

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Stock stays flat or rises modestly. All options expire worthless. If credit > call spread width, NO upside risk.
